definitions.title: gent.
definitions.body: (perh. connected etymolog. with [[טִירָה]] v. Ge 25:16)—a ‘ son ’ of Ishmael Ge 25:15 = 1Ch 1:31 = tribe with which Reuben, Gad, and half Manasseh made war 1Ch 5:19; 'Itonrai)o) te Ka\ )/Arabev Strabo:xvi, 2, 18, )Itonra\onv Joseph:Ant. xiii. 11, 3 ed. Niese; they gave name to their region, which was, substantially, Anti-Lebanon, cf. th=v )Itonra\av ka\ Traxwn\tidov x/rav Lu 3:1; on [[יְטוּר]] and (later) n.pr.terr. Ituraea, v. esp. GASm:Geogr. 544 ff. and reff.
